name: Mahjong (itch) (Under4Mhz)
description:
The classic tile matching game. Match the tile pairs until the board been cleared.

You've spent hours playing it on your PC, and now play it again on your classic retro console.

Download contains ROMs for the following 8-bit consoles and computers: ColecoVision, MSX, Sega SG-1000, Sega Master System, ZX Spectrum 48/128, SpectraVision SV-318/328, Sord M5 and Memotech MTX 500/512
